"'Searching'" is the fourth single from the album [[Elegantly Wasted]] by
INXS. It was never officially released although scheduled for the UK market.
The song was written by Michael Hutchence and Andrew Farriss and recorded by
the band in Dublin during the summer of 1996. It is also the final single to
feature original front man Michael Hutchence, who died two months after the
song was released.
